headline.main: Trump Signs New Travel Ban Aimed at Withstanding Challenges
headline.print_headline: Trump Signs New Travel Ban Aimed at Withstanding Challenges

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump on Monday signed a reworked version of his controversial travel ban Monday, aiming to withstand court challenges while still barring new visas for citizens from six Muslim-majority countries and temporarily shutting down America's refugee program.
